value_slices.name: Basic Details Panel
value_slices.user_value: Click 'View Details' on any account card and see extended account information in a panel

value_slices.name: Enhanced Interactions
value_slices.user_value: Navigate details naturally with keyboard, click outside to close, and have only one panel open at a time

value_slices.name: Complete Data Display
value_slices.user_value: View all account details with proper formatting and graceful handling of missing data
